title: tozhudu vara
sahitya:
tozhudu vara maravOm dinamtOrum nAm pazham udir shOlaiyil tigazhum vElanai


anupallavi

  azhagOr uruvAgi aDiyAr manamagizh arum kATSi tarum varadap-perumAnai


caraNam    ulaga vAzhvu idanil ovvaoru nALum nam kulai naDukkameDukka pala vaghaiyil menmEl
talai tUkkit-tAngum tIngellAm nInga talai vaNangi avan tuNaitanaik-kOrip-pera
